title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern
subtitle: Nevara
para: Led a team of 5 interns and delivered 4/4 product milestones on time. Architected and deployed an AI-powered sales coaching platform on AWS using FastAPI microservices with Supabase. Built LLM pipelines (prompt engineering, input compression, RAG, lightweight agents) with a feedback loop from user responses, reducing sales coach workload by ~90% (10 hours to 1 hour) via automated note generation and multi-call report synthesis.

title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
subtitle: New York University
para: The NYU Tandon Bridge program is a fast-paced 6-month long program that equips students with the fundamentals of computer science. My tasks include teaching and mentoring students on C++ programming, data structures and algorithms, operating systems, among others. I'm also in charge of grading exams for cohorts of 100+ students.

title: Associate Research Consultant
subtitle: GBA Economic Consulting
para: Conducted quantitative research for 15+ high-impact consulting projects across energy, telecom, transportation, intellectual property, and antitrust. Delivered presentations in English and Spanish to diverse stakeholders including C-level executives. Enabled clients savings of over $10M through data-driven insights. Top clients included Mastercard, LATAM Airlines, Engie, among others.

title: Data Scientist
subtitle: Ministry of Education, Government of Chile
para: Led a data science team developing a student dropout prediction model integrating large datasets from multiple government departments. Boosted prediction accuracy from ~50% to over 80%, directly impacting national policy responses during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Research Intern
subtitle: Ministry of Labor, Government of Chile
para: Enhanced national unemployment insurance simulations by upgrading labor market models and cash flow tracking for retirement benefits. Used econometric and statistical modeling techniques on large-scale administrative datasets, coordinating batched jobs on an in-house GPU server.
